content.detailedDescription:
Filled out with witness on the phone, at mufon h.Q., by field investigator l. flechtner, on july 5th, 2016.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
on the evening of july 4th, while at the dog park with my dog and a friend, we saw a giant orange orb travel from west to east. just as it was passing by we saw another one and then a third. they seemed to fly in formation, maybe connected, in a straight line. we heard no noise and no other planes were in the area at the time. they were not following the street, but went between the dog park and the trailer park at a low altitude.
we had a clear sky and no moon.
------------------------------------------------------------------

on may 1st, may day, i saw, in the same dog park, at about 10 p.M., a bright orange tear drop with red at the top, going from east to west. then we saw a second one coming toward us. it was like the bodies of two helicopters big, stacked on top of each other. it was lit up orange.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

four years ago while at the same dog park with three friends, i looked up and saw a large triangle. it was coming from the west to east. it was silent with a big red circle under it with fireplace like flames coming out of the bottom. we watched it for about 10 minutes and my friend saw it  and said "oh yeah, project 86" and went back to taking to his friend. none of the men seemed the least bit surprised to see it and while i was panicking inside i keep repeating what i was seeing so i would not forget.
afterward one of my friends could not remember seeing the triangle craft at all. i did feel a outward calmness as it went by and disappeared.The dogs did not react to it at all--------------------
content.summary: On the evening of the fourth of july, while at the dog park, i saw a hugh giant orange orb pass between the dog park and the trailer park

content.detailedDescription: At 9;30pm on july 4th,2016, at this time my girlfriends takes her brother to work. as she left,10 or 15 mins. later,,my mother-in-law,calls for me to come outside to see the fireworks.After watching them for maybe 30 or 40mins.,i hear my mother-in-law,say'are those helicopters'? i turn to the north/west,and see 2 white/yellowish, around balls, lights.As soon as i seen them i ran in the house grabbed a pair of 10x/50 binocks. looking thru the binocks i saw,a very very bright white light, so bright unable to see any structure.All i could make out that it was round,ater maybe 5 or 10 mins,i heard mother-in-law say'hey where did the other one go'i looked fast but she was right it was gone,so i figured to stay on the one i was looking at so not to loose it.As it slowly moved south/east,i seen it started to dim,mother-in-law,said,she could bearly see it,then said,it was gone she could no longer see it,but it still could looking thur the binocks,what i see had me in awe.It was round and there seemed to be like an arua, like a full eclips that covers the sun,but you see like glowing around the full diameter. but it wasnt light coming from around the diameter,it was like,like lines like energy, like energy lines. watched it for maybe 10 or 15mins. like that,then,it was to far beyond buildinds and trees to see.Iam completly taken aback to the whole situation,like why me,why i have to see this stuff,wasnt looking for it.
content.summary: Round glowing ball or orb,,very very bright,so bright unable to see structure.

content.detailedDescription: We were out walking the dog about 9:30 pm on june 2nd 2015 and as we were crossing the street i saw what i thought at the moment was several airplanes or helicopters above the trees looking down the street. i thought wow, the city really has grown for the airport to have so much flight traffic.  at that point my friend hurriedly and anxiously told me to get my phone to take pictures.  i wasn't completely aware of what he was going on about until i got to the middle of the street and he pointed out that they weren't planes. as i looked up at the sky down the middle of the street i saw several lights of different colors moving in various directions.  there were about 6 lights in red, yellow and white, some moving horizontally, others vertically.  i reached for my phone to try to record all i could.  then i realized that to the right of the street there were 3 much brighter and bigger lights in white, horizontally aligned, off over the trees.  there was no sound to it. they started to individually dim from the one on the left, with another appearing on the right side just as the one on the left had gone out.  i wondered if whatever it was was turning.  by now we were both excitedly running down the middle of the street trying to record what we were watching, and hoping to get to the house and in the car to follow it.  we ran the 2 blocks to the house and got in the car with our dog, and took off in the direction we had seen it. we got on the road but couldn't find it anymore. i checked the phone for the recording and pictures, but nothing was visible on it. we went out again a few times after that to see if we could get a video or picture of it but nothing so far.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw several lights of different colors in the northwestern sky while walking dog, moving in different directions then slowly turning off

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9pm and it was at lake highland in orlando florida in orange county. it would randomly pop up here and there and flying away and flash some lights it didn't make any noise. two other people i was with clearly said it looked like a black triangle. it didn't seem to have any doors but possibly very small windows where the lights were popping out of it.
content.summary: Saw a triangle craft over lake highland in orlando on the 4th of july.

content.detailedDescription: I watched the light suddenly change directions and turn south west. i live on lake michigan and keep binoculars hanging inside on the deck door handle and wanted to get them but was afraid i would lose sight of the light. but as i watched, it seemed to grow dim as though it were behind a thin cloud layer. i finally did go to the door and retrieve the binocs and sure enough, lost the light. disappointedly turned m attention back to the fireworks display but within a few seconds, the dim light was back in the north east and this time there could be no doubt there was something unusual about it. it started to flash on and off at a very regular interval but between flashes it changed positions in a random pattern with the distances between locations varying wildly. some moves were far enough to seem impossible. this activity continued for about 8 to 10 minutes then quite suddenly two very bright lights came on, no more fuzziness, no more blinking and i could see a semblance of the rear structure of the craft as it moved very fast off to the south east until it vanished over the lake horizon. now that i have had a chance to estimate all of the distance and size factors, l believe it was very, very large. too bad this occurred during a fireworks display because i know what they will say about that! but on the other hand, had it not been for the display, i would not have been out on the deck.
content.summary: Watching fireworks display to the south east from my deck when i notices a bright light {star size) in the north east, moving slowly north. first thought, helicopter. next moves discounted that.

content.detailedDescription: On july, 3, 2016  around 10:30 pm  on my night walk, looking to the north west , and saw an orange object going fast to the north east , it looked like some white around around the edges when it disappeared... thought that was it,  when two more showed up from the west in the same linear direction  then a third  by itself within seconds , i stayed  to see if more was coming... one made its appearance and if like it knew i was taking pictures disappeared before it moved as close as the others did. from what i could tell when they appeared there was a flash of white light like it popped into the sky.. as like the first one i noticed disappearing. not sure if anyone else saw this sighting,as there was nothing mentioned via media.
content.summary: Orange objects coming  from the north west direction to the north east, then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Good day
you might want to have a look at the ufo on my you tube site , it's from my deck in 2013.
i live in abbotsford bc canada and my deck faces south, the us border its maybe 2 miles away.
at two or so on a saturday afternoon. i needed to see how long my new underwater video camera would run on it's own?
i have hummingbirds that drink from my pound and well looking at the video i saw a bib on the screen.
i was thinking it's my male bird going in for a wee nip of water, when i slowed the video down here is this ufo whizzing by and doing 4 or 5 hard southern turns towards the usa.
i have the sd card with it on it...
you tell me what you think, i do not think it's a us spy drone or canada border drone.
content.summary: You might want to have a look at the ufo on my you tube site it's from my deck in 2013. i live in abbotsford bc canada and my deck faces south

content.detailedDescription:
Report filled out by field investigator l. flechtner, at mufon h.Q. with witness on the phone on july 5th, 2016
--------------------------------------------------------------------
on sunday night at 8:45 pm i opened the window for the cats to look out and saw a very large blue lighted rectangle about 130 feet from my house near the back fence.It was 200 feet long, 8 feet high and 15 feet wide. there seemed to be a lot of quick movements around the base of the object. like legs moving. when i walked out there i saw nothing but the blue light. i first thought it was the farmers with their cattle. but there were no cattle and farmers, just the blue rectangle. i went back in the house. i could hear a high pitched sound like a drill. i went back to check and noticed a tall dark dude about 80 feet away from me. i yelled at him that i could see him. he seemed to be monitoring the activity. he was over 7 feet tall and dressed in a nice suit, but i couldn't see his face. i went back in side, when i went out again i saw this white little guy, moving like a robot across the ground. he was humanoid, but moved like a robot. he was white like school paper and was wearing a white suit. he kept bending over toward the grass as he moved. then i saw three orangish orbs shoot straight up into a dark grey  metallic cloud and i could see a craft inside the cloud when the orbs lit it up as they neared it. it was partially hidden in the cloud. 
i went down the street to try to alert my neighbors but no one was home. when i got back everything was gone. 
i called the police and they came and took pictures. they had a geiger counter with them and didn't find any radiation at the landing site. they did find the thick grass was pressed down where i saw the blue triangle.
they filled out a report and said they had other cases and believed me.
i live with my elderly parents and they heard and saw nothing. slept through the whole thing. my coon dog howled at them. something was there.
content.summary: Opened the window for the cats and saw a very large blue rectangle about 130 feet by my back fence.

content.detailedDescription:
This email was received by missouri asd today through our website: "my friend and i were house sitting at an older, 1 bedroom house in the middle of nowhere outside sarcoxie night before last. neither of us has ever spent the night there before and the house isn't particularly nice, or clean and has the portable kind of air conditioner with 2 large hoses that you have to wedge in the window. we had moved it to the bedroom and at 3 a.M., very bright lights came in through the area where the curtain was pulled up and to the side because of the a.C. hoses. it lit up a straight line, going up until reaching the ceiling, about a foot thick. this continued, line after line, almost like the lights under a scanner. when we looked out the corner, the lights were so large and bright, it almost looked and sounded like some type of large farm machinery, and there are 2 big fields behind and beside the house. on the right side there is type of metal barn, then the tree line begins. it would be near impossible to even fit something like that next to the house, much less turn to go to the back. after several minutes after "scanning" the entire room, it moved to each room in the house, doing the same thing, but not in the front, which faces the highway. this was during a thunderstorm and the rain quit above the house the whole time this went on, which was for 2 hours. the thunder and lightning never stopped and the thunder was louder than any i've ever heard. almost immediately after it left, the rain returned. last night, i had a similar experience that i would be more than happy to explain over the phone. it was not a drone or  farm equipment. the closest neighbors didn't see it, so i'm thankful my friend did, or i might worry i'm going crazy. i don't know what to do or who to call, but i am absolutely terrified. please contact me as soon as possible, at any time." 
the event occurred at 3 a.M. to 5 a.M. in the early morning hours of july 3, 2016
asd contacted the witness by phone today and obtained further information. the witness went back to the house with her boyfriend the next night (actually later the same night july 3) and again the lights appeared but at the earlier time of 10:30 p.M. and the witness was afraid and called her parents to come pick her up immediately. the witness and her boyfriend searched the exterior grounds and house but found no evidence of a landing or damages to vegetation. further information will be in my report.
content.summary: Unexplained bright lights scan house for two hours during thurnderstorm

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were driving the i10 from las cruces to lordsburg and spotted three bright lights in the sky off to our right at about 9pm. they formed a triangle - the brightest was the one to the left. around half an hour later we noticed that they hadn't moved at all (in relation to each other - or in relation to their position to us it seemed, despite the fact that we were moving at speed along the interstate).

we first noticed the lights as they were very bright in the sky - they were eye catching - then we kept noticing them as they weren't appearing to move. we didn't know what they were at all; they didn't look like anything we'd seen before - they didn't look like natural lights and they were too high up but they were unsupported, so we assumed they must be a plane or helicopter, but they hadn't moved at all. 

i had my camera with me (we were on holiday in america from the uk so it was constantly out in case of cool roadsigns and bumper stickers!) and it has a fairly good zoom so i tried taking some pictures of the lights but i couldn't get a perfect shot of them because of the movement of the car.

we were joking that it might be aliens as i was zooming in, purely because they were so stationary it didn't seem right or normal, but when i got a better look at the zoomed photo i got a shiver and i didn't feel like we were joking anymore as we actually couldn't think what else they could be. that sounds daft/stupid but i started shaking with an adrenaline for some reason. i felt like i shouldn't be looking at it, and my partner said she felt the same. it looked like they had flames or trails coming from them.

we were going to pull over at the next opportunity so i could get a better photo but before we could come off, the two less bright lights seemed to blink off and the last and brightest one shot straight up into the air at a speed i've never seen before and disappeared. it went so quickly i couldn't get a photo of it or really even have time to tell my partner what was going on. 

(i feel like i should point out that when we got home from our holiday and i started looking into this i've found that there are military bases and things nearby and my partner has pointed out that it could have been a plane or something from one of them, but at the time we both totally didn't think the lights were planes. however, i am uploading photos and am happy to be told that i was overreacting to what i saw if you can confirm it was a plane! thank you!)
content.summary: Three bright lights in the sky didn't move at all for 30 mins then sped off upwards out of sight at incredible pace

content.detailedDescription: White orb in front of triangular formation of green lights. when i lived in las vegas  took photos because i thought the rain (in 1 square block) looked interesting, then found ufo inside photos (both white orb in front and triangular craft in rear) both moved downward over the 2 minutes i took photographs
content.summary: Took 2 photos of unusual cloud/rain formation caught ufo in photos

content.detailedDescription: I was in the balcony of my sisters apartment just chilling. suddenly i saw in the other side of the bay(she lives in front of the guanabara bay and from her apartment in the 11th floor one can see the city of niterói with some hills top in the other side of the bay)some lights comming from behind the hill top one after the other, it looked like bright silver stars, there was about 5 objects i thought it was kind of fireworks but it did not made any noises. they did move and to go up and down and the lights start to twinkle vey fast, it was incredible and i had to call my mothr and my sister to see it. then above the silvr lights it appeared 4 red lights one by one and above them another light like a big star. in the video your hear my voice speaking in portuguese with my mother. then one light after the other vanished leaving only one light behind. take attention to the last light that remains in the video, the light goes very quick to the left of the picture go back to the center and fades away in the back. to see this last moviment of the light you need to watch it several times. then you see that it was a real ufo.
content.summary: I was in the balcony in the apartment of my sister in rio de janeiro when i notice in th other side of the bay comming from behind a hill lights like stars one above the other i start to take the video about 2 minutes after it starts.
content.locationName: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription:
I am the story you've been seeking for. too long to write and will pass any lie detector, this planet is in great danger.
call me. 607-386-2576 you have spoken to me before. i have seen and experienced all accounts of ufos. and know more then has ever been told.
content.summary: I need you to call me promptly

content.detailedDescription:
I was out at the outdoor gun range which i was a member of one night. it was around
10:30 pm. the weather was rainy; the cloud cover went from horizon to horizon. i was
able to see the type of cloud cover from the ufo appearing out of no ware under the cloud.
no sound, just a huge white circle of light at least two football fields across.
it was so bright looked like a giant light bulb. the light it gave off was enough for me 
to see that the cloud cover looked like a black quilted blanket. this month was the first
time ever it rained every day in dallas and fort worth, this was history making.

i stood there looking at it thinking i am getting ready to see what no one else has
ever seen. it was going to come by me very close. i was going to be able to see the
front and back. i was able to see it for around 5seconds then the light it went off,
just like turning off a light bulb with a switch. i was so aggrieved, i then turned and
went back towards my camera as i was walking i looked down and saw a light on the
ground in front of me. holey! i realized they saw me. i left my head light on which
was on top of my cap. i was even then more aggrieved at myself. i myself away!

once i got to my camera i then said—listen to this: ok you owe me for what you
did two nights ago. i know you brought in the clouds so i could not see the moon. i know
you did it. so how about it let me see the moon? what would it hurt? you owe me.
you know and i know nobody will believe me you know it. so how about it?
the next thing the cloud cover started opening up in a circle pattern direction.
i then said okok i need four minutes no give me five minutes ok? i then took my camera
and started looking at the moon. i taped the moon, when i was done i said ok i am
done.

then i then turned walked toward my van sliding door was open, sat down next thing
i stood up yield out and said ok how about it again? i looked at my watch it now
was right at 4 o’clock, i realized it was time for me to go. to miss the traffic.
i know some time was lost, i know it. something happened to me.
i am a very polite person. why didn’t i say something or ask a question? i just saw the cloud cover
open up. i saw nothing up near the cloud, nothing. but something was making it happen.
it was invisible, something was there, made it happen. 

so what kind of contact was this? i wish i could be hypnotized. i think about this so often.
i can see the huge ball of light when i close my eyes and wide open. i know i am very
lucky to have been able to see that ufo very lucky.
content.summary: Huge round circle of white light at least 2-football fields across!

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: While watching 4th of july 2016 fireworks from our 4th story apartment, both my wife & i witnessed a fleet of these oval orange/red glowing objects come from different directions, linger, manuever and ascend into clouds for approximately 20 minutes.  at first i thought they must be chineese balloons or flares, but they were clearly under individual intelligent control. some stayed stationary, others demonstrated vertical, horizontal and zigzag paths at varying speeds. after about 20 minutes, tey individually ascended above cloud cover. they greatly resembled footage of a fleet of blue ovals i've seen on tv reportedly buzzing the nation's capital some time back. identical except for color.These were bright red/orange.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: While watching 4th of july 2016 fireworks from our 4th story apartment, both my wife & i witnessed a fleet of these oval orange/red glowing objects come from different directions, linger, manuever and ascend into clouds for approximately 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
because of the vantage point of our buildings patio deck just outside of our apartment we step outside every year to watch fireworks displays from memorial park, the broadmore, and anywhere else that we can observe fireworks going off...The patio is on the west end of the building and only has a few trees to the west that do slightly hinder our view of pikes peak while in bloom...While watching the fireworks this year, my wife had been watching the sky as we had a few high clouds to the north of us that had produced some lightning...While doing so she had noticed a very bright green light above and slightly west of us and knowing i had spent 8 years in the us navy working in the aviation field and having been involved with aviation all of my life, 3 uncles that served in the us navy and also in the aviation field with 2 of them retiring from the navy as well as my father that spent 20+ years in the us air force, she felt confident that i may be able identify what it was that she was looking at since it was so high above us yet very bright...When i had first looked at it i knew it wasn't a star because of the very bright green lights and the relative distance it was from us...Knowing that aircraft have red and green clearance lights on them i had first identified it as an aircraft but i also had lost interest in the fireworks displays and looked the lights over a bit closer and upon doing so it struck me that there were no red lights visible, just the very bright green lights with a blue edge on just one side...Looking even better at it, it appeared to be 4 green lights in a square pattern and on the one side there was a dimmer blue light on one edge...There was nothing else visible other than the lights..

   after a short period of looking at the lights i changed my previous statement to my wife and told her that i wasn't sure what it was we were looking at...I had also noted that it had not changed position for some time and having lived here in the 'springs' from '69-'71, '87-'91, and for the last time since '95, as well as being around military aircraft for my entire lifetime and observing aircraft behavior, i knew that what this thing was doing was not typical...I leaned up against a pipe alongside of the building to steady myself and put my thumb up directly under the light in an attempt to get a fix on the light and see for sure if indeed the light was moving...After doing so the light dropped behind my thumb then came out of the left side of my thumb, made a horse shoe maneuver, went behind my thumb and then came out of the right side of my thumb and began hovering steadily in a fixed position...After a period of a few seconds it began a series of maneuvers and then shot directly north of us towards denver and by my best estimation had to have been traveling at least mach 3 with no sonic boom from breaking the sound barrier...One of the things you experience when you've been around military aircraft for as long as i have is a sonic boom when aircraft fly as fast as this thing did...No boom was experienced which was, to say the least, a little unsettling when you see something move that fast...

   there were at least 4 witnesses to this event, three of us are over fifty and the fourth being in his twenties...We joked about what we had seen and shared the fact that this was our first such experience and how we would probably only tell people we trusted not to put us into a straight jacket and padded cell but i have always been an inquisitive individual and i have known about mufon for quite some time now, i have just never dreamed of the fact that i would have my own story to share and now, more than ever, i would like an explanation as to just what in the world it was that i and 3 others saw tonight...I can definitively say that it was far beyond anything in our aircraft inventory...Unless we have advanced so far as to have developed an aircraft with the capabilities and behavior that this one demonstrated tonight in which case our adversaries should beware...

   the light or lights went so far north that we eventually lost sight of them but before we had lost sight of them entirely, it had gotten behind some trees and yet oddly enough were still visible through the trees...Having memorial hospital to the north of us and observing their flight for life helicopters disappear behind the same trees for some 13 years now, it was strange to be able to see the lights so clearly visible through the same trees...

   after having discussed for some time with my wife about what we had seen i felt the need to call the news desk at kktv 11 and ask if they had received any calls about a strange object over colorado springs...The woman i talked with at kktv said that they had not received any calls and after some reflection about the nights events that's when i remembered your organization, mufon, and decided to check to see if there were any reports from our area of which i found none...It's still early after the fact however so i'll be bookmarking this site and checking back regularly...

   i hope i've been concise enough and descriptive enough for you to have an idea of the events that have taken place here even though i know that none of us have the answers as to what these objects are, maybe some day we'll have the answers but for now it remains a mystery...This is like a puzzle and until the last piece is in place we won't have any idea as to what the picture is until then...I wished i had pictures or video but i felt that i would not have time to go back into our apartment, find our camera and make it back in time to document the event...

   event duration was approximately 3-5 minutes...Approximate altitude of object was 2-3,000 ft. overhead and about 80-85 degrees west of us...Approximate size of object was at least 100 ft. from side to side, at least the size of a p3 orion, if not larger...Capable of speeds in excess of mach 3 to the best of my judgment...Very bright green light, or possibly four very bright green lights with only one side of what appeared to be a square object emitting a blue light...Lights were steady with no flickering and no atmospheric disturbances...This was definitely not an atmospheric event, swamp gas, green laser nor anything of the sort...This was an object that moved through the sky and demonstrated very unusual characteristics not found in our current aviation technology or capabilities...As far as i know...It's up to you to decide if this is worth investigating...I hope you do because i have a ton of questions now and i would probably ask as many questions as any of your investigators would or could even armed with the knowledge that you probably don't know any more than i do...In any case please contact me and reaffirm my belief that i'm not crazy because this has really rattled my cage...

   thank you for being there mufon and letting us know that there are truly extraordinary events that occur and that you believe it's worth investigating...It's a shame nasa get's all that money and doesn't seem to have the same belief system that you do...Seti program seems to have taken a very big hit as well...If you put everything together it almost seems that there is an attempt to bury the fact that there is something going on...I've seen the milky way without a telescope and there is no way you can tell me we're the only intelligent life form, only now i've seen proof of intelligence not of this world...Please find the answer and share it with us...We need to know about our neighbors...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While watching fireworks displays noticed a very bright green light stationary above us...

content.detailedDescription: Glowing orbs viewed in sky that traveled horizontal to the ground. elevation was approx. that of an airplane but with no blinking lights associated with aircraft. no noise. appeared in nne sky and tracked towards the east eventually trailing off in the nw. definitely not fireworks. saw a total of six lights over a period of maybe 45 minutes.
content.summary: Series of 6 glowing orbs tracking nne to ne

content.detailedDescription: This is the fourth strange object i've seen in the sky in about a week period. on july 4th i was outside talking to my neighbor when i noticed at about 8:30 p.M. a strange bright object in the north west sky. the sun was setting, but it was not yet dark. i thought it might be a bright star or planet, or possibly a satellite reflecting the sun's light. it appeared to hover in the same spot for about thirty minutes, but seemed to have moved a little north (but this may be due to earths movement). then the object grew dim and faded, which i thinks debunks the idea it was a star or planet. it hovered in the same spot for about thirty to forty fives minutes, and then disappeared. what does that? i do have some photos and video footage, but it would take special software to zoom in to see the object with clarity.
content.summary: Bright orb hovering in same spot for about 30 minutes then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
There were bad storms occurring in winnipeg and it's surrounding area's this evening . for some reason my spouse & i were full of energy tonight and could not sleep. it was 11:45 pm and we were trying to wind down while watching a classic car show. during the show for some reason i felt compelled to continually check the wind outside and how it was bending the trees. i even commented on how strong the winds were at about 11:50 pm. with in 5 mins( or less) i looked outside to checked the winds again to only find that the trees were not moving at all. i found that very odd since the wind was so brisk just moments ago. i mentioned "how the trees were stagnate & not moving at all",  to my spouse. he said " maybe we are in the eye of the storm ?"  ...Then laughed.  i didn't find that too funny  so i had to take a look outside for myself. so i threw my slippers on and ventured out. as i stepped out i noticed there were no winds at all.
initially i looked southwest  because there were some pretty cool cloud formations happening with the storm. the clouds were low , very fluffy and light greyish color against the black sky. the clouds really stood out. they were moving from the northeast and a pretty quick pace.  as i walk from west to east i turned around to face west. it was then that i saw a huge bright white light behind a large fluffy cloud. clear skies were on the horizon so the contrast of the bright light behind the light greyish cloud upon the black sky really stood out!! in the back of my mind i  had 2 questions ....1) the size of the bright light seemed to be allot larger then a full moon...& .. 2) i do not ever remember the moon being in that location. i didn't want to leave but i thought i would go inside to get my spouse as a witness as well as check my my " skyview app " on my phone to see where the moon was tonight. to my astonishment the moon was not even out tonight!! it is suppose to rise at 7:20 am!! and no.... there was no noise at all. it was not a helicopter or a plane.With the wind not blowing at all i could hear everything. 
i am an avid skywatcher and have seen many amazing things in my life but i have never written about them. i felt compelled to write about this because of it's size. although i only witnessed this for a moment i know this was something amazing.This was huge. it was like a huge orb in the sky behind the clouds. i only wish i would have had my camera to take a picture of it!! i am so energized right now i cannot even sleep!!
 this is my second sighting in a month. on june 7,2016 i also witnessed 2 small orbs in our winnipeg skies. they moved like they were dancing in the sky without any limitations!!They were directly north at about 2:15pm. maybe i will take the time to write about those next.Thank you for having a forum to allow us to write of our experiences.
content.summary: Very large bright white glowing circular object larger then a full moon behind low lying clouds

content.detailedDescription: 4-5 objecs appeared over the west horizon moving north east.Over mt.Charleston roughly heading towards area 51. the craft were equally spaced out. about 2- miles apart from each other. i'm a student pilot and can  actually is judge distance between aircraft. all air fast promptly change direction dye north and illumination ceased with lose of, all sight  direct line of sight ceased at this time, approximately coinciding with the sunset and reflections possibly reflecting upon the fuselage of object. check flights on flightradar24, nothing listed....
content.summary: 4-5 orange-red solid light objects with change of direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was not going to report this but but now i feel comfortable coming forward since mufon did contact me about my last report.

there was no craft involved in this encounter. i was laying down on the couch one night watching tv when what felt like a small hand touched me around the right rib cage area for a second. i did not see anything at all. the hairs on my neck went straight up. i grabbed a shotgun and loaded it. saw absolutely nothing whatsoever. 

moved out of ventura county. now in riverside county for over a year. about 7 months ago was shopping at a grocery store and the exact same encounter took place. same small size hand touched me in exactly the same place. this time i did not freak out i was somewhat used to it.

now if this does not get your attention, this will. my friend from high school who i sometimes talk to on facebook or on the phone, recently has had similar encounters recently from just simply communicating with me on the phone or over the internet. 

am i on some kind of watch list? is it possible i have already been abducted and not know it? is my friend not a target because of me? am i being watched?????
content.summary: Close encounter of the third kind.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house at 9:10pm and saw an red solid lit object with a faint green blinking light ascend to my nw 5 miles away and come to a hover. then it descended vertically like a man made drone. then it ascended and flew a few miles in about a second and came to a hover again. then i knew what i was looking at and ran inside for my cell phone and came back out where it was still in a hover. then it headed due east as i headed due east on foot to my backyard chasing it to keep it in sight. this thing flew 40+ miles in under 5 seconds (mach 4+) until it was a prick of light that i could only see out of my peripheral vision. i guess it came to a hover over the ontario area. i waited a few minutes for it to come back but it did not head west again. i went back to the front yard to finish watching fireworks going off in the neighborhood glancing eastward ever so often. well a few minutes went by and it came back and parked itself directly over me and my neighbors heads who were waiving at it cause i head my cell phone aimed at it and was sending it an s-o-s code with a flashlight app i had on my phone. after messing with the light app for a few minutes a snapped a photo of it then was going to take a video of it but it was on the move again to the nw after sitting over my head for about 2 minutes straight. it made no noise at 800 to 1000 feet over my head. red light was unwavering with a faint green blinking light. no structure seen. it headed off in a nw direction and i lost sight of it due to an apartment building blocking my view. entire event was about 10 minutes long.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I thought it was a man-made drone until it flew 40+ miles across the sky in under 5 seconds.S

content.detailedDescription: Dice object up in air blinking and flashing colored lights, changing positons often and dispearing and reapearing  then zoom off and disapear
content.summary: Hovered over city with lights changing color and ufo changing position several times and then dissapear and reapear, then zoom off and disappered

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:30 pm est in brattleboro vermont this evening while on my break at work and sitting outside in my car i observed an amazing sight of about 20 to 30 glowing orange orbs traveling in a straight line formation just gliding slowly along from the direction northwest to the southeast as i watched in amazement i watched some slowly cloak and fade in and out until out of sight. i am not the only one to see them luckily one of my co-workers coming back from break as well also saw them but she was driving her car and couldn't take a picture and i had nothing to take a picture with on me. the picture i post here is not what i saw but exactly like what i saw. wow ....What a great night.
content.summary: At approximately 9:30 pm est in brattleboro vemont this evening while on my break at work and sitting outside in my car i observed an amazing sight of about 20 to 30 glowing orange orbs traveling in a straight line formation just gliding slowly along from

content.detailedDescription: Was on a flight from texas to north dakota, i looked outside window and saw this. , now. i'm huge believer in supernatural but i never expected to see anything.  i'm thinking maybe a pond or building. . but it's next to what looks like a river and it's not same color..  so i decided to send it to you.  it's from a samsung galaxy s 6.
content.summary: Saw this outside airplane window

content.detailedDescription: We (2 of us) were in the back yard watching fireworks).  noticed a large bright red (some yellow light) move from the northern to southern sky.  after the orb had past over head,   a 2nd orb (same appearance) followed.  the 1st orb remained on a straight path and disappeared behind a large tree.  the 2nd orb turned to the left before the tree line and faded from view.  these were definitely not fireworks, planes or balloons.  recorded video with phone but very hard to keep image still (have saved the file but since it is 355mb and could not send)
content.summary: Noticed bright red orb, slight yellow color, moving from the north to south.  after 1sr orb had past over head a second orb (same appearance) followed.  1st orb followed a straight path and disappeared behind a tree, 2nd orb followed but turn left left.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside watching bottle rockets go off in my neighborhood. i was looking at the starts overhead and noticed what i thought at first was an airplane. i watched it, and could see it flashed a green light every second or so. i noticed that even thought the green light was consistent, the distance it moved between flashes was sometimes really long and sometimes really short, as if it was skipping through the sky sometimes to the left and sometimes to the right. it moved from about 80 degrees south to directly overhead in a random pattern, then turned around and went back towards the south. as i watched, it stopped and started pulsating a red light, much faster and brighter than the green light it previously emitted. at that point i realized i had no idea what this was and felt scared so i went in the house for about 2 minutes to calm down.
it was still visible when i went back outside, i could see the green light flashing again, but the object was now off to the west at about 60 degrees. i watched it skip around without really going anywhere. from when i first saw the light until up until now took a little over an hour.
i went back in the house to get a glass of water and  my composure again and when i went back out i couldn't find the light after standing there for about 10 minutes searching for it. 
i called it a night after that.
i've seen plenty of aircraft in the night sky,, and i've seen flashing stars, shooting stars, meteors....This wasn't any of those. 
when i said i felt scared - it was that adrenaline feeling that made my heart pound, when i realized i had no idea what i was seeing.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brighter than stars flashing green light moving in a random path, stopped and pulsated red. started moving and flashed green again.

content.detailedDescription: One of my good friend was on tibbet visit last week and they were returning from pangong lake it was evening 6:12 when she saw that clouds on mountain were lookin very beautiful so she took three snaps from her mobile and when she saw it afterwards there was an unknown object captured the date of event is 30 june 2016
content.summary: Pics taken while returning from pangong lake to leh

content.detailedDescription:
The object appeared to be moving in circular patterns, flew straight up at on point and returned in another.
the object appeared to be spherical and was illuminating brighter than the full moon which is crossing the pattern of flight.
content.summary: Observed object moving strangely and grabbed video camera

content.detailedDescription:
This incident happened on a cloudless afternoon.
i stepped out of my van and glanced up as i frequently do. i caught site of the object about 15 deg. above the horizon due west on my location. it took only a few seconds to realize it was moving toward me. i then pointed it out to my travel companion, max. we watched it come closer as it flew about the same speed that the coastguard helicopter, with which i'm familiar, would travel. but, this object was absolutely quiet.
i wanted to run into the house to get my camera but feared i would be gone before i got back out. so, i just stood there with my eyes locked on it. 
it flew past us, constant speed and in a straight line. we watched for 1.5 to 2 minutes. then with my eyes still fixed on this object, it went from full brightness, dimmed and vanished in about a 3 second period. a vehicle, externally lit, would leave a visible fuselage. but there was nothing, totally gone.
several weeks later, i found on you tube a picture from somewhere else of exactly what i saw.
this is conformation to me that these unusual flying objects do exist.
content.summary: If looked like a an orange donut with a red center.
